A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I've come to love Star Wars films\, particularly because of the narrative depth hidden in them (some more than others).  What an absolute pleasure it was\, then\, to find The Last Jedi only adding to thematic complexity and thoughtful character development of this space saga.  Even better\, the film is only enhanced upon multiple viewings.  I hope people come to appreciate this film more as time goes on; it really is quite special.
